title: 'Smelling of chemicals'
body: 'I bought this because I wanted an eco friendly option but on opening the package it is smelling strongly of petroleum or similar chemical smell
column5: making me doubt how safe it is. I am hesitant to bring it near my face while exercising. It is a waste purchase for me therefore.'

title: 'very happy with the product quality'

title: 'Must buy for all yoga enthusiasts!'
body: 'The mats are really good & comfortable. A must buy for all yoga enthusiasts!'

title: 'Well below expected.'
body: 'Foam based. Only thin cork layer. Was hoping to get cork only'

title: 'Great Product'
body: Recently purchased the cork fit yoga mat its worthy because of this light weight, comfortable to use and easy to clean. It has cushiony soft comfort so the knees don't get hurt even after tons of lunges.

title: 'Great product'
body: Recently purchased this cork yoga mat and I'm absolutely loving my yoga practice on this. The fact that it's eco friendly just tops it all. Highly recommend purchasing this!

title: 'Excellent product'
body: Recently purchased this cork yoga mat and I'm absolutely loving my yoga practice on this. The fact that it's eco friendly just tops it all. Highly recommend purchasing this!

title: 'great product at a reasonable price'
body: 'excellent products and does not required a towel for sweating on mat. Great grip. Help me doing yoga in Morning.'
